title: Nazi killer in Holocaust image identified using AI: researcher
description: A U.S.-based German historian believes he’s uncovered the identity of the Nazi killer in one of the most infamous Holocaust images ever taken – and he did so with the help of artificial intelligence.
content:
A U.S.-based German historian believes he’s uncovered the identity of the Nazi killer in one of the most infamous Holocaust images ever taken – and he did so with the help of artificial intelligence.

title: Why Artificial Intelligence Might Become Essential For Job Security
description: Advancements in AI have sparked fears about job loss. In reality, embracing AI, upskilling, and exploring new AI-related roles may reshape your career.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is no longer confined to science fiction or research labs. It's everywhere, and it's becoming a driving force in the workplace. Routine tasks are being automated, and complex decision-making is getting AI assistance. In f... [4524 chars]

title: Big Banks are Becoming Irrelevant (and they know it)

title: India’s National Quantum Mission: A Bold Bet On The Future Of Science
description: In 2023, while much of the world was fixated on elections, wars, and artificial intelligence, India quietly launched something far more consequential: its National Quantum Mission (NQM). Two years on, this initiative deserves to be recognised for what it is—one of the boldest bets any country has placed on its scientific future.

title: Behind job weakness are hints of a productivity revival. Is AI the reason?
description: The artificial intelligence investment boom resembles the tech spree that brought a productivity renaissance three decades ago.
content:
The broadest measure of economic output, inflation-adjusted gross domestic product, grew at a blistering annual rate of 3.8% in the third quarter, which ended Tuesday, a Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta model predicts.
